page.title: 07GOVERNMENT cont'd
page.content:
{Childrens Groups}premises, equipment leaders and information are provided for childrens clubs, playgroups and similar schemes.
{MAYBOLE COMMUNITY COUNCIL.
Was created in 1975 as a result of local government reorganisation. It has 15 members with the right to co- opt 6 others serving 1yr with no voting rights. Meetings are in the council chambers of Maybole town hall on the 1st Monday of each month except ing every third month when a Tuesday meeting allows the{District}and{Region {al councillors}to attend. The{C.C.}is the initial contact with government for local people. Matters of community concern are raised by the public or its members and referred to{District
